panels.text: AI gathers symptoms, asks follow-up questions, and routes patients to the appropriate level of care, whether that’s urgent, virtual or routine.
AI Agents manage scheduling, rescheduling and cancellations for immediate responses and free up front desk.
AI delivers test results with context, using simple language and links to relevant resources, so patients understand what’s next and when to follow up.
Patients can request refills or get medication details instantly, without waiting on hold. AI confirms eligibility, routes to the right queue, or provides status updates in real time.
Automated follow-ups help close care gaps, confirm medication adherence, and surface complications early without adding more calls to your staff’s plate.
